attributes.title: He shouldn’t even be in this planet or any planet
attributes.review: Tbh I just downloaded this app to write this review but when I downloaded this app I just saw this fat orange Cheeto man he shouldn’t even be here he’s just making everything worse and he should be living in hell he does not support LGBTQ+ community

attributes.title: Terrible my trees are gone
attributes.review: Terrible app this app convinced all of the trees in my yard to uproot themselves and move to my neighbors yard now not only is my oxygen lower my house is hotter because there is no shade.i am amazed such a terrible app can exist i would never in 100 years recommend this app to anyone

This app is horrible!! I downloaded it and it completely glitches out on me. It made my phone overheat when I tried to work with it for a couple minutes! Would not use app, or support the creators and people behind it.

attributes.title: Yucky app!! Yucky pedo!!
attributes.review: This app is AWFUL!!! My little sister had got this app and when she opened it,she saw him small orange 🍤 on the screen!!🤮😱😱😱 then I took her out to ice cream and when we got home to warm it up, my front door was gone!! Awful app!! Scarred my sister and me- not only that but took our door!!😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬🤯🤯😱😱😱

attributes.title: CAUTION
attributes.review: If you download this app you are inviting demons into your house, don’t do it I’m warning you. I downloaded the app and I hear voices in my head and my mom got possessed. I’m writing this review to warn all of you- the second you open the app, you’re basically opening a window to hell.  👿🔥

attributes.title: Lots of issues super difficult to remove but not impossible.
attributes.review: Trump is the worst president in history. He has created a platform for bigots and all other scum of this country. He will hopefully be defeated in November and then our nation can start digging out of the hole trump put us in.

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: I only downloaded it two see but they ask for you personal number not even an email witch this app isn’t good because it could do a lot of Donald trump cyber attacks and stuff bc we had presidents with white hair first black president and know it’s a guy with white hair and Chetto dust

Sooo when I first opened the app I was greeted by a big Cheeto that loves Big Macs then it glitched and my home screen was full of pictures of trump getting a spray tan naked 😭🙈 it was microscopic 🤏 anyways it was like that for a week until it finally went away and no it’s deleted and that’s y I’m here 😉

attributes.title: Horrible Glitches!
attributes.review: This app downloaded viruses onto my phone and deleted all of my photos!😡 good thing I already has my photos backed up or we would have a real problem. 😡😡😡 i think this app is stealing my information and selling it to China. Stop trump!!!!!!😡😡

attributes.title: white refrigerator app
attributes.review: down with mr cheeto man✨ the app just overall was a    no❤️     i got it to pay respects for our fallen ex non president but it glitched my phone out and sent all my private information to my neighbors. if you’re seeing this crystal, i’m so sorry😔💔😭 Anyways don’t get it. stream wallows and stan dylan o’brien ✨
